question.xref: DES s8, HC r187, HC r212
question.text: You are following a cyclist. You wish to turn left just ahead. You should

explanation.text: Make allowances for cyclists. Allow them plenty of room. Don’t try to overtake and then immediately turn left. Be patient and stay behind them until they have passed the junction.

answer.text: overtake the cyclist before the junction
pull alongside the cyclist and stay level until after the junction
hold back until the cyclist has passed the junction
go around the cyclist on the junction
